name: Lanarts
description:
Collect a series of keys until you are able to find and defeat the end boss, Pixulloch.  Play as a Fighter, Fire or Ice mage or Necromancer diving into risk-filled dungeons of endless  variety. Collect gear to improve your warrior, but beware threats which are better avoided!

CONTROLS:

Spells - yuiop for spell slots 1 to 5
Use Weapon - g

Controller play supported (key map here TODO) and multiplayer split screen (or LAN, wifi play currently lags)

Inventory - 1 through 9 for item slots, or use mouse to manage (right click to drag/drop item)

Using stairs, picking up items - Simply stop on top of them without pressing any weapon or spell keys

To change the games resolution/toggle fullscreen and other settings, edit runtime/settings.yaml.
